item.title: Crypto introduction
item.description:
Such a thing happened and I started a new job in the crypto domain knowing nothing about it.

Here are a few links which make me more aware of what’s happening:

  • DEX - what is it and what are its advantages compared to centralized exchanges
  • The Open Network Architecture - an overview of the TON network architecture and ideas
  • How to build your own blockchain - a step-by-step guide for building a simple blockchain. Look into my repo to see what happened!

item.title: How to build such blog
item.description:
Here is a short guide on how you can build a page like this yourself using Hugo.

Few snippets for quick onboarding:

create new post: hugo new post/my_new_post.md

edit that post: vim /content/post/my_new_post.md

run local test server to check your changes: hugo server -D
